item.description:
We willÂ  discuss beneficials and pest deterrents plants as well as natural remedies for your garden as well as maximizing your vegetable yield with companion planting applications.This will also be a hands on workshop. We will be installing fruit trees, learn how to sheet mulch properly around a tree and then discuss plant selection for the tree polycultures as well as other applications for your home use. . Each participant will go home with guides. $20( Pay when you arrive, cash or check)

Topics To Be discussed:

- Sheet Mulching

- Proper Tree Installation

- Polyculture Plant Selections and Benefits

-Companion planting for your garden

- Pest identification

- Beneficial plants for your vegetables

- Plants that can harm one another

- Pest Deterrent plants for your garden

- Natural Pest Remedies

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Beneficial and deterrent plant selection & Polycultures/Companion planting.
